t: How do Stores work with other Amazon Ads products?
Amazon Brand Registry | Sell on Amazon
s: For US brands with a utility patent, Brand Registry offers a neutral evaluation process within the Report a Violation tool. The Amazon Patent Evaluation Express program brings in neutral third-party evaluators who are attorneys skilled in patent analysis, to decide whether an asserted utility patent is infringed. The process is an efficient means for utility patent owners and those accused of patent infringement to address their concerns. It is faster than the court ...
